issue.title: [Docs] Improve vertical spacing in the sphinx API docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14194](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14194). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Brought up by `[~apitrou]`, the vertical spacing in the C++ API docs can be improved (see eg https://arrow.apache.org/docs/cpp/api/datatype.html#time-related). Quick fix would be to reduce the vertical spacing within one method, so there is more spacing between methods than between paragraphs within one method.
